Description.Text: Darussaade Istanbul is one of the protected examples of Ottoman civil architecture dating from XIX. century. The wooden mansion, which is restored by sticking to its original, is decorated with elaborately so as to reflect the spirit of the period it belongs to. You will feel like in One Thousand and One Nights, while staying in the rooms where comfort and elegance is in high levels. Darussaade Istanbul, which is in the middle of many unique structures belonging to Byzantine, Roman and Ottoman Empires like Hagia Sophia museum, Blue Mosque, Topkapi Palace, Grand Bazaar, Archeological museum, provides opportunity to explore this magical city with its perfect position within walking distance! After a pleasant walk on seashore in the evenings, where you will see Asia, you can go to a sauna and have a rest. You can be sure to find more than what you expected in Darussaade Istanbul!
At center of historical peninsula but in a very quiet street.

STANDARD - ROOM - Single Room offers 1 double bed with Air conditioning, Heating, Internet access, Room service, Safe in room, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, Laundry service, Telephone, Color TV, Mini bar, Valet service, Non-smoking rooms, Ensuite / Private bathroom and Hairdryer.
Single rooms are designed luxuriously for one person. They are elegantly decorated with 19th century Ottoman-Western style furnishing and equipped with all comforts. Ottoman ceramics comfort bathroom with shower or bath and set with hairdryer and complimentary toiletries. SUPERIOR - ROOM - Double/Twin Room offers 1 double bed or two single beds with Air conditioning, Heating, Internet access, Room service, Safe in room, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, Laundry service, Telephone, Color TV, Mini bar, Valet service, Non-smoking rooms, Ensuite / Private bathroom and Hairdryer.
Here you will find elegant and discreet 19th century Ottoman-Western furniture. The spacious bathrooms featured with glass-wall bathtub or a shower and equipped with ladies mirror, hairdryer and complimentary toiletries. The elegant bathroom will give you the feeling of luxury living. DELUXE - ROOM - Deluxe Double Room offers 1 Double bed with Air conditioning, Heating, Internet access, Room service, Safe in room, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, Laundry service, Telephone, Color TV, Mini bar, Valet service, Non-smoking rooms, Ensuite / Private bathroom and Hairdryer.
Deluxe rooms have bigger space than the double rooms that you can feel the soul of the 19th century Istanbul style. The elegant bathroom will give you the feeling of luxury living with stunning tall windows. STANDARD - SUITE - Suite Room offers 2 double beds with Air conditioning, Heating, Internet access, Room service, Safe in room, Bathroom amenities, Cable / Satellite TV, Laundry service, Telephone, Color TV, Mini bar, Valet service, Non-smoking rooms, Ensuite / Private bathroom and Hairdryer.
Sophisticated style and distinctive decor set the standard for all IstanbulÂ’s luxury accommodations. It has two separate rooms inside; one bedroom and one room with writing desk, a comfortable sofa and cable TV. These rooms have spectacular furniture that gives a fine example of 19th century Ottoman-Western style. Ottoman ceramics comfort bathroom with hairdryer and complimentary toiletries.
